p:
For the RRDE measurements, the disk electrode was scanned cathodically at a rate of 10 mV s −1 and the ring potential was kept at 1.5 V versus RHE. The peroxide percentage and the electron transfer number ( n) were determined by the following equations (ref):
6

where I d is disk current, Ir is ring current, and N is current collection efficiency of the Pt ring. N was determined to be 0.40.
